column4: Can someone teach me how to install/update my nvidia driver? just started using linux the other night so i have no clue how things work in ubuntu, i already have downloaded NVIDIA-Linux-x86-1.0-7667-pkg1.run what do i do with it?
o how do i do that to others?
anyone typing your name will do that, it is function of the program you ar using - if they are using a simular prog then it happens for them
